column1: # SOURCE: Egyptian Ministry of Manpower minimum wage decrees (2024-2025)
# DESCRIPTION: Labor wage rates by worker category for agricultural operations in Egypt.
#              Wages reflect Egyptian agricultural sector rates as of late 2024.
# LOGIC: Base wages derived from Egyptian minimum wage (EGP 6
#        and ERI salary data for farm workers (EGP 60/hour average). Skilled workers earn 1.5-2.5x unskilled rates.
#        Exchange rate: Average 2024 rate of 45.33 EGP/USD used for conversions.
# ASSUMPTIONS: Wages are gross hourly rates before deductions. Agricultural sector wages are typically
#              at or slightly above minimum wage. Informal sector workers may earn less.
#              Work weeks vary by season and worker type. Year-round workers average 40-48 hours/week.
#              Seasonal workers may work 50-60 hours/week during peak periods.
